firewall.description: Firewall settings that apply to all network interfaces.

lan.description: Configuration for LAN interfaces (wired and wireless).

firewall.description: Firewall settings for the LAN interfaces.

interfaces.description: List of wired interfaces to include in the LAN bridge, e.g. eth1.

ipaddr.description: IP address to use on the LAN bridge.

proto.description: Method for setting interface IP address. 'auto' will choose a subnet that avoids conflict with the WAN interface.

autoUpdate.description: Enable automatically updating system software packages.

chutePrefixSize.description: The IP network size to assign to each chute.

chuteSubnetPool.description: The IP range available for chutes in CIDR notation or 'auto'. 'auto' will choose a subnet that avoids conflict with the WAN interface.

onMissingWiFi.description: Behavior if expected wireless devices are missing on boot.

telemetry.description: Configure telemetry function for collecting device measurements.

enabled.description: Enable sending device measurements to cloud controller.

vlan-interfaces.description: Configure handling of VLAN tags on wired interfaces.

firewall.description: Firewall settings for the WAN interface.

interface.description: Name of interface to use for WAN.

proto.description: Method of acquiring interface IP address.

wifi.description: List of physical Wi-Fi devices and their configuration.

wifi-interfaces.description: List of virtual Wi-Fi interfaces and their configuration.

zerotier.description: Configure ZeroTier service, which enables VPN-like functionality.

networks.description: List of ZeroTier networks to join, using their string IDs.
